responses: Im Irene! A student at NYU.
Im just a student majoring in interactive media and business - kinda long title huh?
Im is a 21 year old gal from california~ nice to meet yaa
mmm well I like to exercise when i gots any free time - it helps me relax a bit ya knowww
oml i love swimming! i actually works as a swim instructor for kiddos when im not at schooll
hmm for hobbies i rlly like to singgg and drawww and play gamess - but im not good at any of them so i normally do all those alone lol
haha not super sure what I wants to do but at least something that will make me happy.
welp since im majoring in IMB at NYU id like a future job to have a good mix of business and arts, maybe like a career in video game marketing or UI/UX Design?
it'd be cool to have a bigish family, maybe start my own business?? idkkk haha

catchall: uhhh I'm not sure I get what you're sayinggg - maybe ask me something else about my hobbies.
not sure about that one lmfao - But you can ask me about who i am??
I'm not as smart as you think lol - Try asking me about my future~
